title: Reverted Low Priority Queue
body: Hey Riot, was just curious if I could get the leaver buster reverted on the account 'Zyeze' as the last game I played my computer just couldn't handle the game and kept freezing. I know this is a serious problem in League Of Legends but I'm not the one to purposely leave a ranked game, especially in my placement matches. I agree with the buster systems but yeahhhhhhhh...... :c

replies.body:
>my computer just couldn't handle the game

That seems like something you should fix before going into games.

sorry dude, they aren't going to do anything about that.
as for the freezing thing, does it still happen ? consider doing the repair thing instead of launching the game next time.
